name: Universe 3
description:
Universe 3 is the third in the hugely successful Univserse Series of science fiction role-playing game which has excited strategy fans throught the United States

 

Your job is to see that a diplomatic mission to Earth succeeds... not easy when you know that somewhere on board your ship a trator is lurking.... armed and dangerous. Only you can save the mission from being doomed. Are you up to the job....

  • Animated movement and combat
  • Over 70 areas to map and explore
  • Dozens of objects to use and trade
  • Zooming graphics for close-ups
  • A sophisticated command interface
  • Dozens of characters to interact with
  • No previous Universe experience required
  • Easy-to-use mouse or keyboard controls
